solution_line_template: Between Shop A and Shop B he buys {shop_a_bottles} bottles+{shop_b_bottles} bottles=<<{shop_a_bottles}+{shop_b_bottles}={bottles_from_a_and_b}>>{bottles_from_a_and_b} bottles
Thus he can buy {total_capacity} bottles-{bottles_from_a_and_b} bottles=<<{total_capacity}-{bottles_from_a_and_b}={bottles_from_c}>>{bottles_from_c} bottles from shop C
